abilities.name: Daughter of the Abyss
abilities.rule: This model has the Feel No Pain 3+ ability against Psychic Attack and mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Tactical Perception
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Fights First ability.

abilities.name: Tenacious Spirit
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll if that unit is below its Starting Strength, and add 1 to the Wound roll as well if that unit is Below Half-strength.
